title: How to Give a Back Tickle (Treasure Hunt Remix)

steps.title: Have the recipient of the back tickle lay down face first as if they are going to receive a back rub.
steps.content: Have the recipient of the back tickle lay down face first as if they are going to receive a back rub.

steps.title: This works best on bare skin (tickle factor) but either way is cool.
steps.content: This works best on bare skin (tickle factor) but either way is cool.

steps.title: Say out loud, "Going on a treasure hunt..."
steps.content: Say out loud, "Going on a treasure hunt..."

steps.title: Simultaneously with your finger spell out "going...
steps.content: Simultaneously with your finger spell out "going... on... a..." by tracing big letters (one on top of another) on their back.

steps.title: Draw a big treasure box.
steps.content: Draw a big treasure box. (as you say "treasure hunt")

steps.title: Say "X marks the spot"
steps.content: Say "X marks the spot"

steps.title: - simultaneously draw a big "X" and "dot" the spot right in the middle by lightly stabbing it with your finger.
steps.content: - simultaneously draw a big "X" and "dot" the spot right in the middle by lightly stabbing it with your finger.

steps.title: Say "Three miles down and..."
steps.content: Say "Three miles down and..."

steps.title: - Draw a big tree, slowly draw a line down and a big arrow.
steps.content: - Draw a big tree, slowly draw a line down and a big arrow.

steps.title: Say "...
steps.content: Say "... a question mark!"

steps.title: - Draw a BIG question mark and dot it.
steps.content: - Draw a BIG question mark and dot it. (you could make a popping noise with your mouth as you dot it if you like sound effects.)

steps.title: Say "A pinch..."
steps.content: Say "A pinch..."

steps.title: Pinch 'em on the side (lightly!
steps.content: Pinch 'em on the side (lightly! this isn't supposed to be painful)

steps.title: Say "A squeeze..."
steps.content: Say "A squeeze..."

steps.title: Squeeze 'em a little.
steps.content: Squeeze 'em a little. (Shoulders or side, whichever works best.)

steps.title: Say "A tropical breeze..."
steps.content: Say "A tropical breeze..."

steps.title: Blow on neck.
steps.content: Blow on neck. Optional, give 'em a little kiss on the neck first and then they can really feel the breeze.

steps.title: Say "And a big downpour all over your back!"
steps.content: Say "And a big downpour all over your back!"

steps.title: Quickly tickle them all over their back!
steps.content: Quickly tickle them all over their back!

steps.title: By now they are surely giggling, so tuck 'em in, give 'em a kiss and say "G'night".
steps.content: By now they are surely giggling, so tuck 'em in, give 'em a kiss and say "G'night".
